jv_history.source_quote: Heather Gallagher M.Sc.] Strategic Business, Creative & Partnerships for Experiences & Events \| Former

what_you_do: I help my clients get clear on their goals so speaking and events support their business and aren't just another to-do on the list. I build simple, repeatable systems that remove chaos and decision fatigue, and design speaking strategies and events that are intentional, aligned, and profitable.
who_you_serve: I work with purpose-driven speakers and established business owners who feel called to make an impact… but find themselves stuck in the messy middle.
social_proof: Over 20 years of experience sitting in the meeting planner seat, the side of the table where speakers are selected, budgets are approved, and success is measured by outcomes, not applause.
business_focus: Helping clients turn stage-driven visibility into a profitable stream of revenue.
service_provided: Speaking strategy, event planning and management, business systems and operations
